'''2.0.510-stage''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), or '''2.1.511-stage''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]) is a version of the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]].

== Fixes ==
* New font for better readability.
* Fix for resolution.
* Collection of usage data, which can be toggled off in launcher options.</onlyinclude>
